issue.title: [C++] Automatic checks that kernels don't leave uninitialized data in output
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13042](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13042). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To minimize the risk of issues such as ARROW-13041, perhaps our compute kernel test harness should include a check that allocated data is always initialized (using Valgrind).
